content.question: The economic success of businesses such as the British South Africa Company was in part dependent on which of the following developments in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: The migrations of indentured workers from Asia
The increasing availability and variety of consumer goods
The development of new technologies such as the telegraph
The adoption of innovative practices in banking and finance

content.answer: The adoption of innovative practices in banking and finance

topic.text: 5.7: Economic Developments and Innovations in the Industrial Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
